title: Bowl
description:
Wan-li mark (1573-1619), but Kâ€™ang-hsi period (1662-1722)
One of a pair of bowls (83.113.5-6); porcelain, underglaze blue decoration of flowers in pots on outside, geometric bands near top of inside, four character Wan-li marks.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Gene H. Quintana
